Contact Us
We Look Forward to Serving You
Pub-style dining, trendy cocktails and an inviting atmosphere await you at Golden Lyon Vintage Pub – one of the neighborhood’s most popular establishments. If you have any questions about our restaurant/bar or would like more information, please don’t hesitate to get in touch.
